accounts.name: exiting_node
docs: The exiting node account (mutable, as its upload count may be decremented).

accounts.name: replacement_node
docs: The replacement node account (mutable, for potential updates).

accounts.name: config
docs: The storage configuration account (mutable, for potential updates).

errors.name: TooManyUploads
errors.msg: Exceeded maximum upload for this account

errors.name: TooManyReports
errors.msg: Can only submit one report for data

errors.name: InsufficientAccounts
errors.msg: Insufficient accounts. Provide matching number of replacement

errors.name: PendingReplacement
errors.msg: Pending replacement. Encourage replacement to submit PoS

errors.name: InvalidChallenger
errors.msg: Challenger must be one of the assigned nodes

fields.name: data_hash
docs: Hash of the data being verified.

fields.name: shard_id
docs: ID of the shard being verified.

fields.name: merkle_root
docs: Optional Merkle root for PoS verification.

fields.name: merkle_proof
docs: Optional Merkle proof path for the leaf.

fields.name: challenger_signature
docs: Optional challenger signature for PoS verification.

fields.name: challenger_pubkey
docs: Optional public key of the challenger.

fields.name: actual_size_mb
docs: Optional actual size in MB for oversized data reporting.

types.name: ShardReplacement
docs: Structure defining a shard replacement request with data hash and shard ID.
